text:
[Verse]
City lights shine bright tonight
Dreams alive take flight in sight
Footsteps echo on the street
Life's a journey ain't it sweet

[Verse 2]
Eyes up high stars in the sky
Whisper secrets as they fly
Every shadow tells a tale
Heartbeats quicken sail the trail

[Chorus]
We're chasing the moon on this open road
Fueled by passion dreams untold
With every step we break the mold
Together young and bold

[Verse 3]
Sunrise paints the world anew
Colors burst in every hue
Breathing in the morning air
Love and hope are everywhere

[Bridge]
Feeling free as wind will blow
Side by side we shine and glow
Echoes of our laughter loud
Walking tall and feeling proud

[Chorus]
We're chasing the moon on this open road
Fueled by passion dreams untold
With every step we break the mold
Together young and bold
title: Chasing the Moon
